plugin.name: FOP2 Manager Autoconfiguration
plugin.description: Needed for having new buttons added/removed from FOP2 when your backend performs an asterisk reload. You must have the FOP2 Manager installed and point the scriptReload variable to the full path of the update_conf.php script.
plugin.description-es_ES: Este plugin actualizar√° las bases de datos del FOP2 Manager con nuevos botones o configuraciones cada vez que Asterisk sea recargado (reload). Debe apuntar la variable scriptreload a la ruta completa del script update_conf.php del FOP2 Manager.
